title: 2022 Corvette ZR1
description: The 2022 Chevrolet Corvette ZR1 is a high-performance sports car with a focus on both speed and handling. It features a twin-turbocharged 5.5-liter V8 engine, generating 1,064 horsepower and 828 lb-ft of torque according to GM News. The ZR1 also utilizes extensive aerodynamics, including a high downforce carbon fiber rear wing, front dive planes, and other aerodynamic enhancements. It's equipped with carbon ceramic brakes for exceptional stopping power.

title: Audi RS7
description: The Audi RS 7 is a high-performance hatchback sedan that blends luxury with incredible power and agility. It's powered by a 4.0-liter V8 biturbo TFSI engine, producing up to 621 horsepower, and can accelerate from 0 to 60 mph in just 3.3 seconds.

title: 2025 Toyota Camry
description: The 2025 Toyota Camry features an all-hybrid powertrain, offering front-wheel drive (FWD) or all-wheel drive (AWD) options. The FWD models use a 2.5-liter four-cylinder engine paired with two electric motors, generating 225 horsepower. The AWD model adds a third electric motor to power the rear wheels, resulting in 232 horsepower. The 2025 Camry also boasts a refreshed exterior with a new front grille and updated LED headlights. A new XSE Nightshade Edition trim is available, featuring blacked-out accents and 19-inch black wheels.
